About This Property
Absolutely massive 6 bed 3 bath with renovations galore and two parking spots, laundry in unit, two porches and a yard! Easy nonpermit street parking for friends visiting and tons of space to spread out in inside. Equally sized rooms and lots of natural light! Walk to Oak Square in under a minute, the YMCA and multiple bus lines (57, 501, 503 and 64). One month broker fee.
35 Champney St is an apartment community located in Suffolk County and the 02135 ZIP Code.
